categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A male individual was a Jedi Master at the time Vernestra Rwoh was a Jedi youngling in the Jedi Order. At some point the Jedi Master was in the middle of meditating when he died. Rwoh later recalled the master when comforting the Jedi Padawan Imri Cantaros about the loss of his own master, Douglas Sunvale.
